AScry.name: Foresight
AScry.description: Look at the top {{count}} of your deck. Put one into your hand, then discard the rest.

RecipieBook.name: Recipie Book
RecipieBook.description: When you play your first <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> each turn, create a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> of the same rarity.

PotionBelt.name: Potion Belt
PotionBelt.description: You start each combat with a drafted Uncommon and a drafted Rare <c=abf5ff>Potion</c>.

LiquidExtender.name: Liquid Extender
LiquidExtender.description: You start each combat with a stack of Potion Saver.

ExtraHands.name: Extra Hands
ExtraHands.description: When you play your first <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> each turn, draw a card.

PremadePotions.name: Premade Potions
PremadePotions.description: You start each combat with a drafted common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c>.

ElixirPoppers.name: Elixir Poppers
ElixirPoppers.description: When you play a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c>, immediately attack for 1 damage.

description.None: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a random side.
description.A: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand or deck to a random side.
description.B: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a side of your choice.

description.None: Add an uncommon <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.A: Add an unommon <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.B: Add two uncommon <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> cards of your choice.

description.None: Exhaust a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand. When you do, <c=hurt>Attack 2</c>.
description.A: Exhaust a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand. When you do, <c=hurt>Attack 4</c>.
description.B: Exhaust a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand. When you do, <c=hurt>Attack 2</c>.

description.None: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.
description.A: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.
description.B: Play the top two <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.

description.None: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a random side, then play it.
description.A: <c=textBold>Draw 2.</c> Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in hand to a random side, then play it.
description.B: Upgrade two <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> in your hand to a random side, then play them.

description.None: Add a common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.A: Add a common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.B: Add two common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> cards of your choice.

description.None: Deals <c=hurt>damage</c> equal to your total statuses.
description.A: Deals <c=hurt>damage</c> equal to your total statuses.
description.B: Deals <c=hurt>damage</c> equal to your total statuses plus two.

description.None: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck.
description.A: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck.
description.B: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your Deck and Discards.

description.A: Duplicate a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand, draw pile, or discards.
description.B: Duplicate a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand twice.

Enflame.name: Enflame
Enflame.description: Each attack for the rest of the turn deals {0} heat to the target.

Cryo.name: Cryo
Cryo.description: The next hit deals {0} additional damage to this ship.

AcidTip.name: Acid Tip
AcidTip.description: Your next attack applies {0} corrosion to the target.

AcidSource.name: Acid Source
AcidSource.description: Each attack for the rest of the turn deals {0} corrosion to the target.

SuperStun.name: Super Stun
SuperStun.description: Each attack for the rest of the turn stuns the target.

PotionSaver.name: Potion Saver
PotionSaver.description: The next Potion card you play isn't consumed.

Nichole.name: Nichole
Nichole.description: Your ship's biochemical engineer. Nichole generates <c=abf5ff>potions</c> to support other characters, and can upgrade and use them in interesting ways.
